mdRecord.dcterms:title: Pocket surgical instrument set
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in leather and metal case; includes: curved sharp point bistoury - shell and metal, F.Arnold; dressing forceps - metal; scissors with one open ring - metal; artery forceps - metal, Willms; ivory handle with slide catch - ivory and metal; spring catch fenestrated artery forceps - metal; pocket case knife - shell and metal; female catheter tube - metal; grooved director - metal; curved sharp point with case bistoury - metal, Sklar Germany; male catheter - metal; dual end probe - metal; female catheter tip - metal; abscess lancet - shell and metal.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
